RDNTLG.​Command.​ConsoleCommandAttribute
Attribute
[AttributeUsage(AttributeTargets.Method, AllowMultiple = false, Inherited = false)]
public sealed
RDNTLG.​Command.​ConsoleCommandAttribute

Define a method to execute when receiving a specific command through the console via the ConsoleCommandSystem.

Methods that use this attribute must be declared as follows "static void METHOD_NAME(ArgumentsParser)".

Only available under the RDNTLG_CCM/UNITY_EDITOR preprocessor definitions.

Variables
Command
public readonly string Command

The name of the command.

SupportedArgs
public readonly string SupportedArgs

Arguments this command will try to use.

Example
public readonly string Example

Short usage example.

ExecOnMainThread
public readonly bool ExecOnMainThread

Should the method using this attribute but only called on the main thread?

Most of the time (or if you don't know what this parameter means), leave it to true.

In the editor, methods are ALWAYS called in the main thread.

string 
_command,
